sentences.en: Bronchography may reveal dilated enlarged ducts of hypertrophic gland.
sentences.cn: 支气管造影可显示出肥大腺体的腺管已经扩张和肿大.

sentences.en: Chronic enlargement of the gland occurs with tumors.
sentences.cn: 腺体慢性肿大的起因是肿瘤.

sentences.en: Deficiency syndrome of Kidney Yang involves the dysfunction of Hypothalamic - Pituitary - target gland axis.
sentences.cn: 肾阳虚证下丘脑 - 垂体 - 靶腺(肾上腺、甲状腺、性腺及胸腺)轴的功能紊乱.

sentences.en: Her mother has an underactive adrenal gland.
sentences.cn: 她的母亲肾上腺机能不全.

sentences.en: Hormone secretion is controlled by the pituitary gland.
sentences.cn: 荷尔蒙的分泌是由垂体控制的.

sentences.en: Infected nervous tissue or salivary gland tissue is the best source of the virus.
sentences.cn: 感染的神经组织或涎腺组织是病毒的最好来源.

sentences.en: It is also an endocrine gland secreting at least two important hormones.
sentences.cn: 它也是一种内分泌腺,至少分泌二种重要的激素.

sentences.en: Objective To improve the diagnosis and treatment for myelolipoma of adrenal gland.
sentences.cn: 目的提高肾上腺髓质脂肪瘤的诊断与治疗水平.

sentences.en: Objective To remedy lacrimal hypersecretion by procaine blocking lacrimal gland.
sentences.cn: 目的利用普罗卡因封闭泪腺治疗泪液分泌过多症.

sentences.en: The duct that drains the entire gland is the main duct.
sentences.cn: 整个腺体的导管汇总在一起称主导管.

sentences.en: The polytene chromosomes found in the salivary gland cells are among the largest chromosomes known today.
sentences.cn: 唾液腺细胞中的多线染色体是目前已知的最大染色体之一.

sentences.en: The stem and packing gland are also stainless steel for corrosion protection.
sentences.cn: 阀杆和填料密封装置同样采用不锈钢,具有耐腐蚀性能.

sentences.en: The tumor in his prostate gland was caught at an early and very likely curable stage.
sentences.cn: 由于他的前列腺肿瘤是在早期被发现的,处在很有可能治愈阶段.

sentences.en: This is a snake's poison gland.
Two side thyroid gland appearance, densities such as often.
sentences.cn: 两侧甲状腺形态 、 密度如常.

trans.tran_en: an organ of the body which produces a substance that the body needs, such as hormones, sweat, or saliva
